data.title: Oracle Fusion Training Licenses [Award]
data.meta_description:
***Please note that this is an award notice and not a call for competition***

This requirement is f... A Contract Award Notice by UK Shared Business Services. Value £115K.
data.text:
Description

***Please note that this is an award notice and not a call for competition*** This requirement is for the supply of licenses in order to provide Oracle Fusion Training with accompanying accreditation. The total value of this requirement is £114,698.31 excluding VAT This has been sourced via a single source action against PCR Regulation 32,2,(b) (ii) - Competition is absent for technical reasons.
